objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has developed custom malware for use in their operations.(Citation: Eset PlugX Korplug Mustang Panda March 2022)(Citation: Cisco Talos MUSTANG PANDA PLUGX PUBLOAD MAY 2022)
